casebody.data:
Argued and submitted October 31, STATE OF OREGON, Respondent, v. LARNEY LEWIS SAGER, Appellant. (95-09-37011; CA A91311) 927 P2d 1110 Irene B. Taylor, Deputy Public Defender, argued the cause for appellant. With her on the brief was Sally L. Avera, Public Defender. Timothy A. Sylwester, Assistant Attorney General, argued the cause for respondent. With him on the brief were Theodore R. Kulongoski, Attorney General, and Virginia L. Linder, Solicitor General. PER CURIAM

conviction affirmed; remanded for resentencing November 27, 1996

Before Deits, Presiding Judge, and De Muniz and Haselton, Judges.
